column2: ENGLISH
I'll take a stroll down to the local §YMarketplace§!
Off we go!
You have decided to walk down to the nearby market, to take a look at what the merchants are selling. Which stall do you want to visit first?
You decided to go back to the previous set of merchants, which one do you wish to visit?
I'll take a look at what the Weaponsmith has to offer!
I'll take  a look at what the Armorsmith has to offer!
I'll take  a look at what the Jeweler has to offer!
Continue down the Market
Visit the §YWeaponsmith§!
Visit the §YArmorsmith§!
Visit the §YJewler§!
Continue down the §Ymarket§!
You continued down the marketplace, and found a Blacksmith and a merchant selling general goods
I'll take a look at what the Blacksmith has to offer!
I'll take a look at what the General Goods Peddler has to offer!
Neither of them sound interesting, I'll continue walking!
Visit the §YBlacksmith§!
Visit the §YGeneral Goods Peddler§!
Continue down the §Ymarket§!
As you reach the end of the Marketplace you notice a Bowyer who has set up shop
I'll take a look at what the Bowyer has to offer!
Hmm… Maybe I missed something, I'll go back to the start of the market and check again!
Screw this, they aren't selling anything of value!
Visit the §YBowyer§!
Go back to the beginning of your stroll through the §YMarket§!
Exit the §YMarket§!
You have arrived at the Weaponsmiths stall, so far you haven't spotted any special weaponry. But the Weaponsmith is indeed selling basic weaponry
I'll take a look at the Blade Weaponry
I'll take a look at the Blunt Weaponry
I'll take a look at the Polearms
This wasn't what I was looking for at all!
The Smith shows you his §YBlades§!
The Smith shows you his §YBlunt Weapons§!
The Smith shows you his §YPolearms§!
You return to the §YMarket§!
The Smith shows you to the way to his stock of Blade weaponry, and you are fairly impressed! He has 3 different kinds of swords, 3 different kinds of axes and even two different kinds of knives!
Give the Swords a closer inspection
Give the Axes a closer inspection
Give the Knives a closer inspection
I'm not interested in any of these, show me something else!
You decide to take a look at the §YSwords§!
You decide to take a look at the §YAxes§!
You decide to take a look at the §YKnives§!
You back up and take a look at the other categories of weapons.
